field.name: summary
field.value: DefaultViewComponentFactory.Service fails to Inspect assemblies from ViewComponentsConfig

field.name: description
field.value:
The DefaultViewComponentFactory.Service method in the trunk branch of Monorail does not seem to Inspect assemblies configured via the <monorail> configuration (with Windsor integration disabled) in order to load their ViewComponents.
The problem seems to be caused by this commit: https://github.com/castleproject/Castle.MonoRail/commit/753a24d577ae931d45896e3417f16dcc656cd0ba
Attached is a patch with a test case which demonstrates the problem, and also a possible fix (or at least a workaround).

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: MonoRail2 is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/MonoRail/issues
